confirm.title: Verify One-Time Password (OTP)
confirm.description:
Before completing the setup of One-Time Password (OTP), confirm with a verification code. Scan the QR code with your authentication app. If you don't have one, we recommend either {auth_app1} or {auth_app2}.

After scanning the code, enter the six-digit code from your app to verify the setup. If you have problems scanning the QR code, do a manual setup with code **`{code}`**.

error.invalid_code: Invalid code, please try again. If you get this error consistently, please make sure the clock of your Home Assistant system is accurate.
